name: Amira Atwal
text: I was completely enchanted by every moment of it. An instant classic. I can't get the movie out of my head.

name: Mamooty Roy
text: This movie exceeded all my expectations. The plot was so engaging, I was on the edge of my seat the whole time. The cinematography was breathtaking.

name: Krish Arya
text: The movie was an absolute masterpiece of filmmaking.

name: Manjari Ramaswamy
text: I was moved to tears by the end. A true masterpiece of cinema.

name: Riaan Tailor
text: The movie was an absolute masterpiece of filmmaking. I was on the edge of my seat the entire time. I was completely blown away by the sheer talent on display.

name: Ehsaan Borra
text: The movie was a rollercoaster of emotions. I was left with chills down my spine.

name: Misha Ganguly
text: The movie was an absolute masterpiece of cinema. The movie was an absolute marvel of storytelling. The movie was an absolute pleasure to watch.
